title: Nvidia RTX 5090 mobile GPU:  more efficient and a little faster

title: A genetic tree as a movie: Moving beyond the still portrait of ancestry

This innovative approach not only enhances genealogical research but also has applications in tracking disease spread and studying animal migration across different geographic areas.

title: Terahertz imaging: Breakthrough in non-invasive cochlear visualization
snippets: Researchers have developed a new non-invasive technique using terahertz (THz) imaging to create 3D visualizations of cochlear structures in mice, potentially revolutionizing the diagnosis of hearing loss and other conditions. This advancement could lead to the development of miniaturized THz devices, improving diagnostic speed, accuracy, and patient outcomes in various medical fields.
summary: Researchers have developed a non-invasive method using terahertz imaging to create 3D visuals of the cochlea in mice, aiming to transform hearing loss diagnosis. This technique may lead to smaller THz devices, enhancing diagnostic speed and accuracy in medicine.
